p: To test whether the tracheal relaxant effect of the TS Oil also involves any additional mechanism(s), such as anticholinergic like effects, the CRCs of CCh were constructed by adding CCh in cumulative manner to the bath and the tissues were washed with fresh Krebs solution after achieving CCh maximum peaks. The CCh CRCs were repeated in the presence of pre-incubated tissues with increasing concentrations (0.3 and 1 mg/ml) of TS Oil for 1 h ( Shah and Gilani, 2010).
